summary: 4 mental patients formulate the plan to rescue their kidnapped doctor and teach the kidnappers a lesson.
cast: Juhi Chawla|Irrfan Khan|Arshad Warsi|Rajpal Yadav|Suresh Menon|Dia Mirza|Rajat Kapoor|Kamal Adib|Vicky Ahuja|Parthaa Akerkar|Tejas Are|Anil Bahl|Krishna Bansal|Jennifer Mistry Bansiwal|Dolly Bindra|Sukhwinder Chahal|Avinash Chandwarkar|Panne Chatterjee|Mithilesh Chaturvedi|Kurush Deboo|Deepak Desai|Kenneth Desai|Makrand Deshpande|Dorothy|Vallabh Gada|Gulshan|Zakir Hussain|Madhavendra Jain|Ankita Jog|Harry Josh|Nikita Joshi|Karan Kashyap|Shah Rukh Khan|Ramesh Khanna|Ravi Khote|Ajit Kulkarni|Devender Kumar|Mohit Kumar|Krishnan Manav|Atul Mathur|Utkarsh Mazumdar|Sanjay Mishra|Jimmy Moses|Ashwin Mushran|Satindra Narulla|Sunil Pal|Omkar Purohit|Mukesh Rishi|Hrithik Roshan|Rakhi Sawant|Depesh Shah|B.R. title: Krazzy 4
